Noxolo Kiviet bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, onye bụbu onye isi ala nke Eastern Cape site na afọ 2009 ruo na afọ 2014 na onye bụbu ọkà okwu nke Eastern Cape Provincial Legislature (2004-2009; 2014-2019)
Ọ bụ onye otu African National Congress N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2012, ụlọ ọrụ South African Public Service Commission kwuru na Kiviet bụ onye isi ala kachasị njọ.
Mgbe ntuli aka nke Mee na afọ 2019 gasịrị, Kiviet ghọrọ onye otu National Assembly of South Africa
Onye isi ala Cyril Ramaphosa họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze na akụrụngwa
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 30 Mee na afọ 2019 ma na-eje ozi ugbu a n'akụkụ Minista Patricia de Lille.
Kiviet ghọrọ onye otu ndị omeiwu na afọ 1994
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya dị ka ọkà okwu nke ndị omeiwu
Kiviet nọchiri onye bụbu onye isi ala Mbulelo Sogoni onye nọchiri nwanyị mbụ bụ Nosimo Balindlela
Ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi ala nke mpaghara Eastern Cape.
Ọ gụsịrị Bachelor of Administrative (B.Admin) na Mahadum Fort Hare, B
Admin Honours n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2010 ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fort Hare, a na-enye ya Master na Public Administration.
